problem: Bin $A$ has twenty white ball and forty-four black balls.  Bin $B$ has ninety balls labeled $\$1$ and four ball labeled $\$7$.  Bin $W$ has thirty-one balls labeled $\$8$ and thirty-four ball labeled $\$500$.  A game is played as follows: a ball is randomly selected from bin $A$.  If it is black, then a ball is randomly selected from bin $B$; otherwise, if the original ball is white, then a ball is randomly selected from bin $W$.  You win the amount printed on the second ball selected.  What is your expected win?
